string S;
int Prefix[2 * MAX + 7][26];


int main() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
//    READ("in.txt");

    deb_mode = 1;

    if( deb_mode )
        srand( int( time( NULL ) ) );


    int i, j, k, l, n, m, q, a, b, c;

    cin >> S;
    n = S.size();
    S = " " + S;

    rep1( i, n ) {
        rep0( j, 26 ) Prefix[i][j] += Prefix[i - 1][j];
        Prefix[i][S[i] - 'a']++;
    }
    cin >> q;
    while( q-- ) {
        int le, ri;
        CI( le, ri );
        bool odd = 0;
        int ans = 0;
        rep0( i, 26 ) {
            int t = Prefix[ri][i] - Prefix[le - 1][i];
            if( t & 1 ) {ans += ( t - 1 ); odd = 1;}
            else ans += t;
        }

        cout << ans + odd << "\n";
    }





    if( deb_mode )
        cerr << "EXECUTION TIME = " << ( 1.0 * clock() ) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC << " SECONDS\n";
